description_translations.en: Assess the trip’s success and gather feedback from participants. This phase involves evaluating the trip experience and documenting lessons learned to improve future planning.
description_translations.es: Evaluar el éxito del viaje y recopilar comentarios de los participantes. Esta fase implica evaluar la experiencia del viaje y documentar lecciones aprendidas para mejorar la planificación futura.
description_translations.it: Valutare il successo del viaggio e raccogliere i feedback dei partecipanti. Questa fase prevede la valutazione dell'esperienza di viaggio e la documentazione delle lezioni apprese per migliorare la pianificazione futura.
description_translations.lv: Novērtēt ceļojuma panākumus un savākt dalībnieku atsauksmes. Šajā posmā ietilpst ceļojuma pieredzes novērtēšana un iegūto mācību dokumentēšana, lai uzlabotu nākotnes plānošanu.

name_translations.en: Assess trip success and gather feedback
name_translations.es: Evaluar el éxito del viaje y recopilar comentarios
name_translations.it: Valutare il successo del viaggio e raccogliere feedback
name_translations.lv: Novērtēt ceļojuma panākumus un savākt atsauksmes

description_translations.en: Conduct an evaluation of the overall trip experience and collect feedback from all participants to identify areas for improvement.
description_translations.es: Realizar una evaluación de la experiencia general del viaje y recopilar comentarios de todos los participantes para identificar áreas de mejora.
description_translations.it: Effettuare una valutazione dell'esperienza complessiva del viaggio e raccogliere feedback da tutti i partecipanti per identificare le aree di miglioramento.
description_translations.lv: Veiciet vispārējās ceļojuma pieredzes novērtēšanu un savāciet atsauksmes no visiem dalībniekiem, lai noteiktu uzlabošanas iespējas.

name_translations.es: Realizar una encuesta posterior al viaje

description_translations.en: Survey participants to gather their feedback on the trip, covering aspects like itinerary, accommodations, and overall satisfaction.
description_translations.es: Encuestar a los participantes para recopilar sus comentarios sobre el viaje, cubriendo aspectos como el itinerario, el alojamiento y la satisfacción general.
description_translations.it: Intervista i partecipanti per raccogliere i loro feedback sul viaggio, coprendo aspetti come l'itinerario, l'alloggio e la soddisfazione complessiva.
description_translations.lv: Aptaujājiet dalībniekus, lai iegūtu viņu atsauksmes par ceļojumu, aptverot tādus aspektus kā maršruts, izmitināšana un kopējā apmierinātība.

name_translations.en: Document lessons learned and provide expense report
name_translations.es: Documentar lecciones aprendidas y proporcionar un informe de gastos
name_translations.it: Documenta le lezioni apprese e fornisce un resoconto delle spese
name_translations.lv: Dokumentēt gūtās mācības un sniegt izdevumu pārskatu

description_translations.en: Summarize insights from the trip, document key takeaways, and provide a detailed expense report for reference in future planning.
description_translations.es: Resumir los conocimientos obtenidos del viaje, documentar los aspectos clave y proporcionar un informe detallado de los gastos como referencia para futuras planificaciones.
description_translations.it: Riepiloga i risultati del viaggio, documenta i punti chiave e fornisce un resoconto dettagliato delle spese come riferimento per la pianificazione futura.
description_translations.lv: Apkopojiet ceļojuma atziņas, dokumentējiet galvenos secinājumus un sniedziet detalizētu izdevumu pārskatu kā atsauci turpmākajai plānošanai.

interlinkers.name: Demographic and activity satisfaction questionnaire
interlinkers.description: Tool to collect participants’ feedback on their overall satisfaction and specific aspects of the trip.

interlinkers.name: Final end user's questionnaire - Quality of Service
interlinkers.description: Questionnaire to measure participants' perceptions on service quality and to gather insights for improvement.
